评论概述: "Remember when the Germans bombed Pearl Harbor?"
评论详情: This sweatshirt is a real conversation piece at any event with your snobby ivy league educated neighbors, especially the ones who can't help themselves gloat all the time.

评论概述: Just what I was looking for

评论详情: I wish I had ordered up another size.  I went up one size, but apparently that was 7not enough.
Gets you so much compliments if ur a high schooler

I wear a large and fit as expected, sleeves are plenty long enough.  Of course, green is the actual color Bluto wore in Animal House.  Lettering is good quality as is the weight and build of the sweatshirt.
The sweatshirt was perfect! My teen loved it.  The sweatshirt is warm and inner material is soft and comfortable.  And, it’s a great conversation starter!
great fit - just wish it were the thicker kind of sweatshirt (yeah, "old school") but is correctly sized and washes well without any fading
Bought as a gift.  Our son loves how soft and comfy it feels.  He says it is just the right thickness!
I love animal house and this hoody is so cute. I wear it all the time. Not too thick, soft inside. Big fan
I didn't like the quality of the printing on the shirt. I'm afraid it will be gone after the first wash.

评论概述: Great sweatshirt, thin material, long in length
评论详情: As a 5ft6 girl with a long torso, this was a bit on the longer side (I ordered a medium based on review suggestions). Would be a great sweatshirt for someone slightly taller. Material is thin, but soft. Perfect sweatshirt for warm classrooms, definitely reccomend.
What can I say - it’s a classic! Good quality and reasonable price. Son took to college and got LOTS of comments.

I ordered the COLLEGE sweatshirt in the maroon color, size small. This sweatshirt looks just like the photo. The lettering is amazing, might I add. When you receive it you'll know what I mean. The letters can be described as a matte white.  Fit: I am a Female, about 121lbs, 34B. This sweatshirt fit as expected.
Nicely made sweatshirt; my students got a big kick out of it. I am very happy with it.
Love it! Comfy and washes up well. Compliments right and left!
